DataElement.preferredName: Primary Malignant Neoplasm Surgical Procedure Excision Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of date a malignant tumor at the original site of growth was surgically resected.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Malignant Neoplasm Surgical Procedure Excision
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor at the original site of growth._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.
